snippet: Seldom do plug-and-play devices live up to the name, but the xPrintServer, a $100 device that links iPhones and iPads wirelessly to a printer, may be the exception. Maybe.
abstract: Seldom do plug-and-play devices live up to the name, but the xPrintServer, a $100 device that links iPhones and iPads wirelessly to a printer, may be the exception. Maybe.

headline.main: Printing From Your iPhone, at a Price
